Marguerite Driscoll

  1. Foster Name: Marguerite Larson
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Marjorie
  3. Foster Family: R. P. Larson
  4. Location of Family: Bertrand, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Lincoln, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 5
  8. Date of Birth: 8/21/1906
  9. Date of Death: 8/6/2000
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Marguerite Ek
  12. Spouse Name: David Wesley Ek
  13. Source: Crossroads, Summer 1989, p. 9; Crossroads, September-October 2000, p. 10; National Orphan Train Complex; Los Angeles Times (undated); Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 1 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 223-246; 1920 United States Federal Census.
